verses.verse: <S%G5279>Put<s%> them in <S%G5279>mind<s%> to be <S%G5293>subject<s%> to <S%G746>principalities<s%> and <S%G1849>powers,<s%> to <S%G3980>obey<s%> <S%G3980>magistrates,<s%> to be <S%G2092>ready<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%>

To <S%G987>speak<s%> <S%G987>evil<s%> of <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man,<s%> to be <S%G269>no<s%> <S%G269>brawlers,<s%> but <S%G1933>gentle,<s%> <S%G1731>showing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4236>meekness<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

For we <S%G2249>ourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were <S%G4218>sometimes<s%> <S%G453>foolish,<s%> <S%G545>disobedient,<s%> <S%G4105>deceived,<s%> <S%G1398>serving<s%> <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> and <S%G2237>pleasures,<s%> <S%G1236>living<s%> in <S%G2549>malice<s%> and <S%G5355>envy,<s%> <S%G4767>hateful,<s%> and <S%G3404>hating<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>
But <S%G3753>after<s%> that the <S%G5544>kindness<s%> and <S%G5363>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior<s%> toward man <S%G2014>appeared,<s%>

Not by <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G4160>done,<s%> but <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G1656>mercy<s%> he <S%G4982>saved<s%> us, by the <S%G3067>washing<s%> of <S%G3824>regeneration,<s%> and <S%G342>renewing<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost;<s%>

That being <S%G1344>justified<s%> by his <S%G5485>grace,<s%> we should be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G3588>This<s%> is a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> and <S%G5130>these<s%> things I <S%G1014>will<s%> that you <S%G1226>affirm<s%> <S%G1226>constantly,<s%> that they which have <S%G4100>believed<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%> might be <S%G5431>careful<s%> to <S%G4291>maintain<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%> <S%G5023>These<s%> things are <S%G2570>good<s%> and <S%G5624>profitable<s%> to <S%G444>men.<s%>

But <S%G4026>avoid<s%> <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G2214>questions,<s%> and <S%G1076>genealogies,<s%> and <S%G2054>contentions,<s%> and <S%G3163>strivings<s%> <S%G3163>about<s%> the <S%G3544>law;<s%> for they are <S%G512>unprofitable<s%> and <S%G3152>vain.<s%>
A <S%G444>man<s%> that is an <S%G141>heretic<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G3391>first<s%> and <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G3559>admonition<s%> <S%G3868>reject;<s%>
<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> that he that is <S%G5108>such<s%> is <S%G1612>subverted,<s%> and <S%G264>sins,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G843>condemned<s%> of <S%G848>himself.<s%>

<S%G3752>When<s%> I shall <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G734>Artemas<s%> to you, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus,<s%> be <S%G4704>diligent<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to me to <S%G3533>Nicopolis:<s%> for I have <S%G2919>determined<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> to <S%G3914>winter.<s%>
<S%G4311>Bring<s%> <S%G2211>Zenas<s%> the <S%G3544>lawyer<s%> and <S%G625>Apollos<s%> on their journey <S%G4709>diligently,<s%> that <S%G3367>nothing<s%> be <S%G3007>wanting<s%> to them.

And let <S%G2251>our's<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> to <S%G4291>maintain<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> for <S%G316>necessary<s%> <S%G5532>uses,<s%> that they be not <S%G175>unfruitful.<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> that are with me <S%G782>salute<s%> you. <S%G782>Greet<s%> them that <S%G5368>love<s%> us in the <S%G4102>faith.<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> It was written to Titus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Cretians, from Nicopolis of Macedonia.
